reporter_caption.center: IN RE GUARDIANSHIP OF FAUST, 67 So.3d 210 (Fla.App. 2 Dist. 2011)

caption.center: In re Guardianship of David Faust, an incapacitated person. DAVID
FAUST, Appellant, v. ELIZABETH FAUST, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Polk County; John F. Laurent, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Jean M. Henne of Jean M. Henne, P.A., Winter Haven; and Mark E. Clements of Elder Law Firm of Clements and Wallace, P.A., Lakeland; and Adrian P. Thomas of Adrian Philip Thomas, P.A., Fort Lauderdale; and Henry E. Nobles, Tampa, for Appellant.
Phillip A. Baumann and Michael R. Kangas of Phillip A. Baumann, P.A., Tampa, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
ALTENBERND, NORTHCUTT, and WALLACE, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
